meanings.definition: To send or deliver (a package or letter) using the services of FedEx.
meanings.sent1: I will be fedexing the documents to the client tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She always prefers fedexing important parcels for quick delivery.
meanings.sent3: Fedexing the birthday gift made sure it arrived on time for the party.
meanings.sent4: His words were like fedexing a message straight to her heart.
meanings.sent5: The efficiency of fedexing the package amazed everyone in the office.

meanings.definition: The act of using FedEx to send or deliver a package or letter.
meanings.sent1: The fedexing of the package was flawless and timely.
meanings.sent2: We rely on fedexing for our international shipping needs.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the fastest fedexing service was intense.
meanings.sent4: Her love for surprises led to creative fedexing ideas.
meanings.sent5: The convenience of fedexing saved us a trip to the post office.
